entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who spoke highly of Harry and was described by Snape as his Head of House. He is also described as looking ill with dark shadows under his eyes and a greyish tinge to his skin.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the Head of Slytherin house who spoke curtly to Malfoy and led him away. He is also described as someone who had watched Malfoy suck up to him for a long time.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as someone who tried to intervene on behalf of Malfoy and suggested that Snape be lenient during Christmas.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the best potion-maker known by Malfoy and is also described as watching Malfoy suck up to Snape for a long time.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as someone who Harry will be back to see in a bit.

relationships.description: Snape is the Head of House for Malfoy.
Slughorn tries to intervene on behalf of Malfoy and suggests that Snape be lenient during Christmas.
